# Data Source: honeycombio_recipients

`honeycombio_recipients` data source provides recipient IDs of recipients matching a set of criteria.

## Example Usage

### Get all recipients

```terraform
data "honeycombio_recipients" "all" {}
```

### Get all email recipients matching a specific domain

```terraform
data "honeycombio_recipients" "example-dot-com" {
  type = "email"

  detail_filter {
    name        = "address"
    value_regex = ".*@example.com"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `detail_filter` (Block List, Max: 1) Attributes to filter the recipients with. `name` must be set when providing a filter. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--detail_filter))
- `type` (String) The type of recipients.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ids` (List of String)

<a id="nestedblock--detail_filter"></a>
### Nested Schema for `detail_filter`

Required:

- `name` (String) The name of the detail field to filter by

Optional:

- `value` (String) The value of the detail field to match on.
- `value_regex` (String) A regular expression string to apply to the value of the detail field to match on.

~> **Note** One of `value` or `value_regex` is required for each `detail_filter` block.
